brief_summary.textblock:
The SYNCAT study intention is to study the level of adherence of the centers in Cataluña tu
      the Syncope Guidelines ESC2009 for the diagnosis and treatment of syncope and the impact
      that following them can have in the prognosis of these patients.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Each patient that comes from the Emergency room and/or in office doctors visit
             (Internal Medicine, Cardiology, Neurology...) with Transient Loss of Conscience
             (T-LOC)

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients younger than 15 years old

          -  Pregnant women

study_pop.textblock: Patients with Transient Loss of Conscience: T-LOC

clinical_study.official_title: Observational Study of the Application of the ESC2009 Syncope Guidelines in Cataluña

overall_official.affiliation: H. Arnau de Vilanova de Lleida
Parc Sanitari Sant Joan de Déu

oversight_info.authority: Spain: Agencia Española de Medicamentos y Productos Sanitarios

primary_outcome.description: Percentage of patients in which the guidelines have been correctly applied for the evaluation of syncope

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
